bug.author: mateuszpieniak
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
I cannot update the histogram on the saved viewed for group of experiments. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Create a group of experiments. Go to Metrics tab and create a view with multiple histograms. Save the view. Try updating one of the histograms by switching the y-axis (different variable).
Nothing happens. I don't know whether it's related to a save view or current view. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
The plot updates. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
Mozilla Firefox 71.0 Ubuntu 18.04 Polyaxon 0.5.6

comments.comment: I am closing this as it does not appear to happen in the new UI, so I assume that it's a bug in the previous version that was solved.
